name: Viral Load (Carl, DragonDaan, ALPHARavenGamer, Dybo, sophielynch221)
name_original: Viral Load (Carl, DragonDaan, ALPHARavenGamer, Dybo, sophielynch221)
description:
How to play: 
Run around and collect key cards to open doors and let the signal through. 
Watch out for the viruses, and try to remove them using levers. There are also buttons to press!

Controls: 
Keyboard: A & D to Run, W or Space to Jump (also works with Arrow Keys) 
Xbox controller: Left stick to Run, 'A' Button to Jump

Artists:  
 Dylan van Bommel
Rebecca Clarke

Programmers: 
Carl Christensen 
Daan van der Poel 
Sophie Lynch 
Tycho van E 

This game was created in three days for the "International Educations Game Jam 2022"
